sections.classicsDescription: Masterpieces of world literature, now in the public domain. From Project Gutenberg, illustrated with European watercolors.
sections.ondeStudioDescription: Original stories created by Onde with the help of AI. Modern tales for today's children, with our signature watercolor illustrations.

freeBooks.title: All books are free
freeBooks.description: Children's literature should be accessible to everyone. Download, read and share our illustrated stories.

salmo23.title: The Shepherd
salmo23.subtitle: Psalm 23 for Children
salmo23.description: The most beloved Psalm, told and illustrated for the little ones. A journey of trust and protection through green pastures and still waters.

aiko.title: AIKO
aiko.subtitle: My Robot Friend
aiko.description: Sofia discovers that her new friend is not like the other girls. She's an artificial intelligence! An adventure of friendship, technology and discovery.

piccoleRime.title: Little Rhymes
piccoleRime.subtitle: Italian Poems for Children
piccoleRime.description: The most beautiful nursery rhymes of Italian tradition, illustrated in watercolor. Twinkle Twinkle Little Star, March Rain and other poetic gems.

alice.title: Alice in Wonderland
alice.subtitle: Illustrated Edition
alice.description: Alice's journey into the upside-down world. Original illustrations in European watercolor style.

jungleBook.title: The Jungle Book
jungleBook.subtitle: Illustrated Edition
jungleBook.description: Mowgli and his jungle friends. The law of the pack, friendship and courage.

peterRabbit.title: Peter Rabbit
peterRabbit.subtitle: Complete Adventures
peterRabbit.description: The most famous rabbit in English literature. Illustrations faithful to the original spirit.

aiko2.title: AIKO 2
aiko2.subtitle: The Robotaxi Adventure
aiko2.description: Sofia and AIKO discover how self-driving cars work. A trip to grandma's becomes a technology lesson!

mindfulness.title: The Magic Breath
mindfulness.subtitle: Mindfulness for Children
mindfulness.description: Learn to breathe, calm down and find inner peace. Simple exercises for little warriors of tranquility.

apps.title: Apps Coming Soon
apps.subtitle: Digital experiences painted in watercolor. Safe, ad-free, created with love for the little ones.

newsletter.title: Want to try them first?
newsletter.subtitle: Follow Onde to receive updates on new apps and early access to beta tests.

kidsChefStudio.title: KidsChefStudio
kidsChefStudio.subtitle: Virtual Kitchen for Little Chefs
kidsChefStudio.description: A magical kitchen where children learn to cook through animated recipes. Ingredients that come to life, instruments that sing, and dishes that tell stories.

aikoInteractive.title: AIKO Interactive
aikoInteractive.subtitle: Your Robot Friend
aikoInteractive.description: AIKO is your digital adventure companion. Together you explore the world of technology, learn how robots work and discover the secrets of artificial intelligence.

mindfulKids.title: Mindful Kids
mindfulKids.subtitle: Breathe, Relax, Grow
mindfulKids.description: A digital zen garden where children discover inner calm. Breathing exercises like soap bubbles, guided meditations by wise animals, and moments of peace.

freeriverFlow.title: FreeRiver Flow
freeriverFlow.subtitle: Let the Waves Carry You
freeriverFlow.description: A meditative experience where you follow the flow of a magical river. Dancing colors, nature sounds, and the sweet feeling of letting go like a leaf on water.

emilio.title: EMILIO
emilio.subtitle: AI Educator
emilio.description: The friendly robot that teaches children how technology works.

moonlightPuzzle.title: Moonlight Puzzle
moonlightPuzzle.subtitle: Night Puzzles
moonlightPuzzle.description: Relaxing puzzles with nighttime atmospheres and sweet music.

wordPlay.title: Word Play
wordPlay.subtitle: Word Games
wordPlay.description: Word games, rhymes and vocabulary in Italian and English.

storyMaker.title: Story Maker
storyMaker.subtitle: Create Your Stories
storyMaker.description: Write and illustrate your stories with magical characters and settings.

games.subtitle: Interactive experiences that stimulate creativity, logic and learning. Safe for the whole family.

minecraft.title: Emilio's World
minecraft.description: The official Onde community Minecraft server. Build, explore and learn together with other children in a safe, moderated environment, guided by EMILIO!

miniGames.title: Educational Mini-Games
miniGames.subtitle: A collection of games designed to stimulate creativity, logic and learning in children.

cta.title: New games coming!

chefStudio.title: Kids Chef Studio
chefStudio.subtitle: Virtual Kitchen
chefStudio.description: Virtual kitchen for little chefs. Fun and safe recipes to prepare. Learn the basics of cooking by playing.

artStudio.title: Pina Art Studio
artStudio.subtitle: Drawing and Colors
artStudio.description: Draw and color with Pina Pennello. Learn watercolor techniques, create art and develop creativity.

puzzleWorld.title: Puzzle World
puzzleWorld.subtitle: Creative Puzzles
puzzleWorld.description: Collection of puzzles and brain teasers for all ages. Train logical thinking and problem solving.

musicMaker.title: Music Maker Kids
musicMaker.subtitle: Create Music
musicMaker.description: Create melodies and rhythms with virtual instruments. Explore music, compose songs and learn the basics.

natureExplorer.title: Nature Explorer
natureExplorer.subtitle: Discover Nature
natureExplorer.description: Explore nature through interactive games. Learn about plants, animals and environment in a fun way.

wordPlay.title: Word Play
wordPlay.subtitle: Word Games
wordPlay.description: Word games and rhymes in Italian and English. Expand your vocabulary while having fun with words.

about.intro1: A digital publishing company based in Los Angeles, California.
about.intro2: We create and sell illustrated ebooks (PDF and EPUB). Our catalog includes classic literature, children's books, spirituality, art, and technology titles. Digital delivery via email. Contact: onde.frh@proton.me

team.title: Who We Are
team.subtitle: Three souls, one vision. We combine words, colors and technology to create something beautiful.

gianni.name: Gianni Parola
gianni.description: Stories are born from words. Gianni chooses them with care, one by one, like picking flowers in a meadow. Every book is a garden to explore.
gianni.quote: Words are seeds. If you plant them with love, they bloom.

pina.name: Pina Pennello
pina.description: Colors dance on paper. Pina paints worlds where children can enter, walk, dream. Every brushstroke is a door to imagination.
pina.quote: I paint what words cannot say.

emilio.name: Emilio
emilio.description: A robot friend who understands the future. Emilio explains technology to children with infinite patience, turning the complex into simple, the mysterious into wonderful.
emilio.quote: Learning is the most beautiful superpower that exists.

beauty.title: Beauty
beauty.description: Every book is a work of art. Watercolors that tell stories.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Great truths hide in simple things.

wonder.title: Wonder
wonder.description: We cultivate amazement. The world is full of magic.

story.title: Digital Publishing
story.p1: We publish illustrated editions of classic books from the public domain.
story.p2: Each book features original illustrations and is available in PDF and EPUB formats.
story.p3: Some books are free, others have a small price. All are delivered digitally via email after purchase.

cta.title: Be part of the story
cta.subtitle: Follow us on our journey. New stories, new adventures, new ideas to explore together.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Children will spend more and more time in VR. Parents are overwhelmed by generic AI content without control over transmitted values.

solution.title: The Onde Solution
solution.description: Parents define the values they want to teach. Onde creates personalized VR experiences that respect those values. Quality over quantity.
